info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日第二天-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
<size=64>It was your birthday yesterday?!</size>
(Hands clasped) I'm so sorry I missed it...
Let me make it up to you right now—
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日第二天-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Yesterday I had this feeling like I was forgetting something.  
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, it's only that I've seen you today that I remembered...
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日第二天-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
<size=64>Happy Birthday!!</size>
Sorry I forgot yesterday... Hope you'll accept my belated wishes!
<size=30>(pitifully) Hope it's not too late to make it up to you...</size>
